titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1064_02
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1064_02

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

graphic.desc: By kind permission of British Museum

div.tei:ab: 1.ynʿm | w-bny-hw | bnw | ʾʿzz | gzmw | gzn | ʿṯtr | ḏ-ḏbn | k-ḏ-m | yt= 2.ʿlmnn | b-nḥltm | w-mḥrtm | l-bn | ʾdm | w-ʾmh | bny | ʾʿzz | b-byt= 3.n | w-gbltn | ʾly | ysmynn | ḏ-ynʿm | b-ḫmsn | rbʿn | ḏ-ḍqrn | byt | w-gblt 4.šʾm | ynʿm | ʿm-n | bny | kšḥt | k-l-yknn | hʾ | by(tn) | w-(gbltn | bytm) | [...]

šʾm | ynʿm | ʿm-n | bny | kšḥt | k-l-yknn | hʾ | bytn | w-gbltn | bytm | ...

ʿlmnn b-nḥltm w-mḥrtm l-bn ʾdm w-ʾmh bny ʾʿzz b-byt=
n w-gbltn ʾly ysmynn ḏ-ynʿm b-ḫmsn rbʿn ḏ-ḍqrn byt w-gblt
šʾm ynʿm ʿm-n bny kšḥt k-l-yknn hʾ bytn w-gbltn bytm ...

ʿlmnn b-nḥltm w-mḥrtm l-bn ʾdm w-ʾmh bny ʾʿzz b-byt=
n w-gbltn ʾly ysmynn ḏ-ynʿm b-ḫmsn rbʿn ḏ-ḍqrn byt w-gblt
šʾm ynʿm ʿm-n bny kšḥt k-l-yknn hʾ bytn w-gbltn bytm ...

1.Yunʿim and his sons of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz have made a solemn oath to ʿAthtar Dhū-Dhibān that they would 2.sign the deed of donation and the declaration for the children of the male and female clients of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz--in the estate 3.and in the surrounding cultivated land which are named for Yunʿim--(in total) four-fifths of Dhū-Ḍaqirān, (that is,) the house and surrounding cultivated land 4.which Yunʿim purchased from the lineage of Kashḥat, in order that that house and cultivated land might be a house […]

Yunʿim and his sons of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz have made a solemn oath to ʿAthtar Dhū-Dhibān that they would
sign the deed of donation and the declaration for the children of the male and female clients of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz--in the estate
and in the surrounding cultivated land which are named for Yunʿim--in total four-fifths of Dhū-Ḍaqirān, that is, the house and surrounding cultivated land
which Yunʿim purchased from the lineage of Kashḥat, in order that that house and cultivated land might be a house …

Yunʿim and his sons of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz have made a solemn oath to ʿAthtar Dhū-Dhibān that they would
sign the deed of donation and the declaration for the children of the male and female clients of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz--in the estate
and in the surrounding cultivated land which are named for Yunʿim--in total four-fifths of Dhū-Ḍaqirān, that is, the house and surrounding cultivated land
which Yunʿim purchased from the lineage of Kashḥat, in order that that house and cultivated land might be a house …

Yunʿim and his sons of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz have made a solemn oath to ʿAthtar Dhū-Dhibān that they would
sign the deed of donation and the declaration for the children of the male and female clients of the lineage of ʾAʿzūz--in the estate
and in the surrounding cultivated land which are named for Yunʿim--in total four-fifths of Dhū-Ḍaqirān, that is, the house and surrounding cultivated land
which Yunʿim purchased from the lineage of Kashḥat, in order that that house and cultivated land might be a house …

bibl.seg: Avanzini, Alessandra 1995. As-Sawdāʾ. Inventaire des inscriptions sudarabiques. 4. Paris: de Boccard / Rome: Herder. [Académie des Inscriptions et Belles-lettres; Istituto italiano per l'Africa e l'Oriente]
